mapper.sql: deptId AS "deptId", speechcraft_type_id AS "speechcraftTypeId", speechcraft_type_sort AS "speechcraftTypeSort", speechcraft_type_name AS "speechcraftTypeName", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_crm_speechcraft_type where 1 = 1
and speechcraft_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeId},'%')
and speechcraft_type_sort like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeSort},'%')
and speechcraft_type_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeName},'%')
order by create_time DESC

from daoxin_crm_speechcraft_type where 1 = 1

and speechcraft_type_sort like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeSort},'%')
and speechcraft_type_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeName},'%')
order by create_time DESC

and speechcraft_type_sort like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.speechcraftTypeSort},'%')
